situation: J was repeatedly pushing other students while standing in line for recess, appearing unaware of others' discomfort.
action: The teacher aide gently explained the concept of personal space using a visual chart and demonstrated how to stand in line with proper spacing. Offered J a visual reminder card to keep in his pocket and modeled the behavior with him. Reinforced positive behavior with verbal praise when J stood appropriately.
effect: J responded well to the visual explanation and verbal reinforcement, and eventually lined up correctly. The proactive strategy helped J become more mindful of personal boundaries, promoting a smoother transition.
